Module applications
Package applications.database_gui_application

Class MetroStationsAppController

java.lang.Object
applications.database_gui_application.MetroStationsAppController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MetroStationsAppController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for managing the Metro Stations applications. Handles the UI and operations for searching, sorting, and editing Metro Station data.
